column5: Hi, I've never tried out fall fishing and am looking forward to it in 2 weekends, but for this weekend I don't have a boat. I was wondering if anyone knows of any boat rental places on any Kawartha lake that are still renting out. Thanks for any help.
You might try some of the lodges or camps. Scotsman Point; Pigeon Lake Resort etc. I think these camps are still open for business until November 15th.
Island Marina at the North end of Scugog Island on Lake  Scugog rents till the 15th of November if I am not mistaken. Google them and give them a call.
Mine still is....$100.... safety equipment included, as well as gas, fish finder, wireless trolling motor, live well.  Dirk
